function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Divergence in opinions of different groups of experts","Impact":"Potential for conflicting strategies and viewpoints, leading to inefficiency and disagreement in decision making","Mitigation":"Encourage open communication and collaboration to find common ground, facilitate group discussions and consensus-building","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, video conferencing, and communication tools","People":"Experts, stakeholders, decision-makers","Owner":"Facilitators, project managers, team leaders"},{"Description":"Convergence without consensus","Impact":"Risk of implementing decisions that may not be fully supported or understood by all groups, leading to resistance and potential failure of initiatives","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough explanation and communication of decisions, seek feedback and input from all groups, and strive for full consensus whenever possible","Technologies":"Surveys, feedback tools, decision-making support software","People":"Experts, stakeholders, decision-makers","Owner":"Facilitators, project managers, team leaders"},{"Description":"Use of the expert-led approach for selection and identification","Impact":"Dependence on the expertise and perspectives of a limited group of individuals, potentially overlooking valuable insights and perspectives from wider stakeholders","Mitigation":"Include diverse representation, seek input from a wider range of stakeholders, and utilize methods for collecting and synthesizing a broad range of viewpoints","Technologies":"Survey tools, data analysis software, stakeholder engagement platforms","People":"Experts, stakeholders, decision-makers","Owner":"Research team, project coordinators, stakeholder engagement team"}]}
